1.0.name: wordpress/really-simple-breadcrumb
1.0.description: This is a really simple WP Plugin which lets you use Breadcrumbs for Pages! Just download the Plugin, put in the correct Folder, as explained below, use the code shown below and activate it.. That simple! If you want to modify the styles use the class .breadcrumb in your CSS file or navigate to wp-content/plugins/really-simple-breadcrumb/breadcrumb.php and modify the echo output of the function breadcrumb_css.
